Sequence Information.Peptide Name: SAAP fraction 2 (Surfactant-associated anionic peptides; Asp-rich; sheep, ruminant, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.8552650] Gram-negative bacterium:Pasteurella haemolytica (MBC50=0.04 mM in Zn-saline, MBC50=11.49 mM in Test buffer; Peptide/surfactant mixture MBC50=0.05 mM in Zn-saline, MBC50=6.44 mM in Test buffer; Peptide/serum mixture MBC50=0.05 mM in Zn-saline, MBC50=10.38 mM in Test buffer; Peptide/surfactant/serum mixture MBC50=0.06 mM in Zn-saline, MBC50=5.93 mM in Test buffer).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against negative bacteria.  No amidation at the C-terminus

Literature.Title: Isolation of an ovine pulmonary surfactant-associated anionic peptide bactericidal for Pasteurella haemolytica.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1996 Jan 9;93(1)412-6.
Literature.Author: Brogden KA, de Lucca AJ, Bland J, Elliott S.

Literature.Title: Small, anionic, and charge-neutralizing propeptide fragments of zymogens are antimicrobial
Literature.Author: Brogden KA, Ackermann M, Huttner KM

Literature.Title: Isolation of an ovine pulmonary surfactant-associated anionic peptide bactericidal for Pasteurella haemolytica
